en.subject: Get a Personalized Purra Demo
en.preheader: Book a 30-minute session with our team to unlock full potential

header.title: Ready to See Purra in Action?
header.subtitle: Get a personalized walkthrough tailored to your needs

body.intro: We noticed you've been exploring Purra. Want to see how it can transform your procurement process? Our team would love to give you a **personalized demo** tailored to your specific needs.

benefits.title: What You'll Learn
items: How to run comprehensive vendor due diligence in minutes
Setting up automated price monitoring and alerts
Best practices from top procurement teams
Advanced features specific to your industry

offer.title: ЁЯУЕ Book Your Demo
offer.description: Choose a time that works best for you. Our demos are **30 minutes**, completely free, and there's no obligation.

body.footer: Not ready for a demo? No problem! Reply to this email with any questions and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
